title: Faster Math
description: I need help on my homework! Connect to programming.easyctf.com:10300 where a series of 100 problems await you.
hint:
There's only 4 types of problems. You can do it :) If you're having difficulty with the time limit, try running it on the shell server. Its internet should be pretty fast.

If you'd like, post your favorite, wackiest autogenerated problems to @easyctf!
